name: CUBE SHOOTA'
description:
This game is just a little fun game to see what high score you can get. There is no save feature cause this game already took too much time but you can screenshot, either way, it's just a little fun game.

I would appreciate feedback cause this is the 2nd game I have ever made.

Controls: WASD for movement, Esc for the pause menu and left click is what you select thing with (Resume, Restart, and so on)
